@1@ Returns the real part of the complex number {{c|z}}, i.e. {{c|z.real()}}.

{{rrev|since=c++11|
@A,B@ Additional overloads are provided for all integer and floating-point types, which are treated as complex numbers with zero imaginary part.
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|z|complex value}}
{{par|f|floating-point value}}
{{par|i|integer value}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ The real part of {{c|z}}.
@A@ {{c|f}}.
@B@ {{c|static_cast&lt;double&gt;(i)}}.
